page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO RIPON
page.content: The city of Ripon is in North Yorkshire and has a population of about 12,000.The nearest large town is Harrogate,11 miles away,but Ripon is surrounded by small villages which it serves as a market town. The main employers in Ripon are the Buxted chicken factory and Morrisons Supermarket,and there are also several medium-sized light engineering firms. Many people are also employed directly or indirectly in agriculture and recreation. Ripon is a garrison town and has two barracks,Claro and Devereux at which the royal engineers are based.Many soldiers from Ripon are stationed at Northern Ireland,Belize or the Falkland Islands. In the past ten years Ripon has become a tourist centre,visitors come to see ancient buildings and monuments.
